title: The IDW: 1 Year Later with Jonathan Kay
description:
The phrase "Intellectual Dark Web," or IDW was coined 1year ago today. I spoke Jonathan Kay, the editor of the Canadian division of Quillette magazine about his latest article on the subject. Kay describes the IDW as a set of values and ideas, and that one of the highest values of IDW thinkers is a sensitivity of being told what to think. I found this conversation to be insightful and I rather enjoyed hearing his perspective

Here is Jon's article: https://arcdigital.media/the-intellectual-dark-web-is-a-year-old-do-we-know-what-it-is-yet-7a8dd3d6d06a

Follow him on twitter @jonkay

Follow me here:
twitter: @theother_95
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page
Email me: theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
